title: Large-Scale Mobile-Based Integrated Mathematics Literacy Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Basic Mobile Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: BYOD-based math literacy enhancement classes using mobile applications. Cultivating real-world problem-solving skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical concepts using multimedia elements (text, sound, images) of a mobile application.
Learners can analyze real-life data collected via mobile devices to derive mathematical conclusions.
Learners can exchange peer evaluations and feedback in a collaborative learning environment through a mobile application.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
